import React, { Component } from "react"; import satellite from "./images/sat.jpg"; import met from "./images/met.jpg"; import weatherimg from "./images/weather.jpg"; import burger from "./images/burger.jpg"; import note from "./images/note.jpg"; import work from "./images/work.jpg"; import satelliteGif from "./gifs/whatsup.gif"; import metGif from "./gifs/ADayOut.gif"; import weatherGif from "./gifs/weather.gif"; import burgerGif from "./gifs/Burger.gif"; import noteGif from "./gifs/noteDemo.gif"; import workGif from "./gifs/work.gif"; import { Menu, Modal, Grid, Card, Transition, Image, Icon, } from "semantic-ui-react"; import { IconContext } from "react-icons"; import { FaPhp, FaReact, FaCss3Alt, FaHtml5, FaWordpress, FaGitAlt, FaGithub, FaSalesforce, FaBootstrap, FaMailchimp, FaUikit, } from "react-icons/fa"; import { SiJavascript, SiJquery, SiVisualstudio, SiTailwindcss, SiGutenberg, SiAlpinedotjs, SiZapier, SiPhpmyadmin, } from "react-icons/si"; import { GrMysql } from "react-icons/gr"; let pages = { whatsup: { topic: "what's up there?", about: "An application that finds the satellites in orbit above you and allows you to track your favorites.", source: satellite, gif: satelliteGif, github: "https://github.com/charrmountain/whats-up-there/", href: "https://whats-up-there.herokuapp.com/", }, dayout: { topic: "day out", about: "An arts education application utilizing the Metropolitan Museum of Art's collections.", source: met, gif: metGif, github: "https://github.com/charrmountain/a-day-out/", href: "https://charrmountain.github.io/a-day-out/", }, weather: { topic: "weather dashboard", about: "Weather dashboard that will retrieve a city's current weather and forecast from the user's choice.", source: weatherimg, gif: weatherGif, github: "https://github.com/charrmountain/weather-forecast/", href: "https://charrmountain.github.io/weather-forecast/", }, burger: { topic: "burger devour", about: "An entertaining application that allows the user to create and devour burgers.", source: burger, gif: burgerGif, github: "https://github.com/charrmountain/burger/", href: "https://evening-thicket-44264.herokuapp.com/", }, notes: { topic: "note taker", about: "An application that can be used to write, save, and delete notes.", source: note, gif: noteGif, github: "https://github.com/charrmountain/note-taker/", href: "https://blooming-forest-27574.herokuapp.com/", }, planner: { topic: "daily planner", about: "A daily work planner that displays hourly storable sections that changes color to display past, current, and future hours.", source: work, gif: workGif, github: "https://github.com/charrmountain/work-day-scheduler/", href: "https://charrmountain.github.io/work-day-scheduler", }, }; export default class Projects extends Component { state = { activeItem: "WHATS UP THERE", currentPage: pages.whatsup, }; handleItemClick = (e, { name, title }) => this.setState({ activeItem: name, currentPage: pages[title] }); render() { const { activeItem } = this.state; return (
{this.state.currentPage.topic} {this.state.currentPage.about}

} closeIcon >
); } }
